lines.text: None of your guys have super-speed, right? They couldn't put the sticker on real fast?
None of them were even here at the time of the gu-
Actually, y'know what, how 'bout I ask?
Hey, do any of you punks have super-speed?
It's such a surprise, I didn't even need to actually call anyone, because I already knew!
Jeez, you don't have to be like that. It was just a guess.
No, it was nothin'. I- I didn't mean to hold the button down, it was-
No, Star See- the consultant was bein'- there was a joke.
Hey, Leo! Ask them if any of them have super-speed!
